app_metadata.title: Tailscale

attrs.label: Hostname
attrs.description:
The hostname for Tailscale Node.</br>
Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens are allowed.</br>
Same as `--hostname` flag.

schema.valid_chars_error: Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens are allowed.

attrs.label: Auth Key
attrs.description:
The auth key for Tailscale Node.</br>
Same as `--authkey` flag.</br>
To generate one: https://login.tailscale.com/admin/settings/keys

attrs.label: Auth Once
attrs.description: Attempt to log in only if not already logged in.

attrs.label: Reset
attrs.description:
Reset unspecified settings to default values.</br>
Same as `--reset` flag.

attrs.label: Accept DNS
attrs.description:
Accept DNS</br>
Same as `--accept-dns` flag.

attrs.label: Userspace
attrs.description:
Run Tailscale in userspace</br>
Same as `--userspace` flag.

attrs.label: Advertise Exit Node
attrs.description:
Advertise exit node</br>
Same as `--advertise-exit-node` flag.</br>
Needs enabled IP forwarding on the host via System > Advanced Settings > Sysctls.</br>
Please make sure you read and understand the warnings displayed when adding Sysctls</br>
See also https://tailscale.com/kb/1019/subnets?tab=linux#enable-ip-forwarding

attrs.label: Advertise Routes
attrs.description:
Advertise routes</br>
Same as `--advertise-routes` flag.</br>
Needs enabled IP forwarding on the host via System > Advanced Settings > Sysctls.</br>
Please make sure you read and understand the warnings displayed when adding Sysctls</br>
See also https://tailscale.com/kb/1019/subnets?tab=linux#enable-ip-forwarding

attrs.label: Extra Arguments
attrs.description:
Extra arguments</br>
Flags to pass to tailscale CLI in a tailscale set command.

attrs.label: Tailscale Daemon Arguments
attrs.description:
Tailscaled arguments</br>
Flags to pass to the tailscaled daemon.

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description:
Bind to the host network.</br>
Needed in most cases in order to communicate with the host.

attrs.label: Tailscale State Storage
attrs.description: The path to store Tailscale State.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to as a volume.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB/CIFS Share (Mounts a volume to a SMB share)

attrs.label: Read Only
attrs.description: Mount the volume as read only.

attrs.label: Mount Path
attrs.description: The path inside the container to mount the storage.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: SMB Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the SMB dataset.

attrs.label: Server
attrs.description: The server to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Path
attrs.description: The path to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Username
attrs.description: The username to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: The password to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Domain
attrs.description: The domain to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Containers
attrs.description: Containers where the label should be applied

attrs.label: CPUs
attrs.description: CPUs limit for Tailscale.

attrs.label: Memory (in MB)
attrs.description: Memory limit for Tailscale.

1.3.8.readme:
Tailscale

Tailscale Secure remote access to shared resources

  • When Userspace is disabled, Tailscale will run with /dev/net/tun device mounted from the host.
